About Me

Self Taught Front-End Web Developer, VR/AR Developer, and Programmer.

BIO

Currently working as a VR/AR Developer and Web Developer at Systems Technology, Inc. located in Virginia, USA. I enjoy Game Development and creating VR/AR Experiences. You can find in-depth information on my resume.

Systems Technology, Inc.

VR/AR/Web Developer (Jan 2017 - Present)
HTML5, CSS, NodeJS, Unity, C#, Javascript, Git

I design and develop VR Training Programs and modules using Unity3D, C#, and Javascript to train engineers and maintenance workers in the Nuclear Power Industry and Federal Aviation Administration.

InquisIT, LLC.

Software Developer - Intern (Aug. 2015 - May 2016)
C++, Java, Python, Git

Assisted teams in developing applications using C++ and Python for a few GSA contracts, and built data logging features for applications that combat cyber threats.

Slothparadise, LLC.

VR/AR Developer
Unity3D, Unreal Engine, C#, C++, Javascript, Git

An indie game company started with a friend. We develop fan-made games in VR and AR on the side as our passionate hobby.
